CatDescriptText: Mr. B. Truss, 404 Alpine Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 19, 1958, pg. 9 with question: "Do you think that a business recession has hit the United States? If so, how has it affected you?" answer reads: "Yes, I think that times are hard.  The cost of living is so high that it takes all that a worker makes to live.  I'm a worker at the J & J steel mill."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of B. Truss wearing moustache and plaid shirt, standing in front of shoe store and Optometrist
